children.subject:
swap_manager出现于

  • kern/mm/swap.h
  • kern/mm/swap.c
  • kern/mm/swap_fifo.h
  • kern/mm/swap_fifo.c

性质类似于在lab2中填空的pmm_manager，是一组抽象的接口，需要具体实现。在lab3中实现为swap_manager_fifo。

swap_manager在swap.h中的定义为： 
struct swap_manager
{
     const char *name;
     /* Global initialization for the swap manager */
     int (*init)            (void);
     /* Initialize the priv data inside mm_struct */
     int (*init_mm)         (struct mm_struct *mm);
     /* Called when tick interrupt occured */
     int (*tick_event)      (struct mm_struct *mm);
     /* Called when map a swappable page into the mm_struct */
     int (*map_swappable)   (struct mm_struct *mm, uintptr_t addr, struct Page *page, int swap_in);
     /* When a page is marked as shared, this routine is called to
      * delete the addr entry from the swap manager */
     int (*set_unswappable) (struct mm_struct *mm, uintptr_t addr);
     /* Try to swap out a page, return then victim */
     int (*swap_out_victim) (struct mm_struct *mm, struct Page **ptr_page, int in_tick);
     /* check the page relpacement algorithm */
     int (*check_swap)(void);     
};
在swap_init()中，会访问sm->init()函数，初始化swap_manager。

// the virtual continuous memory area(vma)
struct vma_struct {
    struct mm_struct *vm_mm; // the set of vma using the same PDT 
    uintptr_t vm_start;      //    start addr of vma    
    uintptr_t vm_end;        // end addr of vma
    uint32_t vm_flags;       // flags of vma
    list_entry_t list_link;  // linear list link which sorted by start addr of vma
};

以上是vmm.h中对vma_struct的定义，包含了一个mm_struct的对象和一个list_entry_t的对象

struct vma_struct *find_vma(struct mm_struct *mm, uintptr_t addr);
struct vma_struct *vma_create(uintptr_t vm_start, uintptr_t vm_end, uint32_t vm_flags);
void insert_vma_struct(struct mm_struct *mm, struct vma_struct *vma);

以上是vma_struct的3个重要的函数接口

mm_struct定义在vmm.h中

// the control struct for a set of vma using the same PDT
struct mm_struct {
list_entry_t mmap_list; // linear list link which sorted by start addr of vma
struct vma_struct *mmap_cache; // current accessed vma, used for speed purpose
pde_t *pgdir; // the PDT of these vma
int map_count; // the count of these vma
void *sm_priv; // the private data for swap manager
};

struct Page结构定义在`mm/memlayout.h`中

struct Page {
	int ref; 		// page frame's reference counter
	uint32_t flags; 	// array of flags that describe the status of the page frame
	unsigned int property; 	// the num of free block, used in first fit pm manager
	list_entry_t page_link; // free list link
};

每个Page的对象对应一个实际的物理页面，因此在涉及到物理页相关操作时，都会涉及到此结构，例如：

 - uintptr_t page2pa(struct Page *page) 	// get the physical address of memory which this (struct Page *) page  manages
 - struct Page * pa2page(uintptr_t pa) 	// get the according page from the value of a va
 - void *page2kva(struct Page *page) 		// get the kernel virtual address of memory which this (struct Page *) page  manages
 - struct Page *kva2page(void *kva) 		//get the according page from the value of a kva
 - struct Page *pte2page(pte_t pte) 		//get the according page from the value of a pte
 - struct Page *pde2page(pde_t pde) 		// get the according page from the value of a pde

typedef uintptr_t pte_t;
typedef uintptr_t pde_t;
typedef uintptr_t pud_t;
typedef uintptr_t pmd_t;
typedef uintptr_t pgd_t;
typedef pte_t swap_entry_t; //the pte can also be a swap entry

history.content:
虚拟页式存储管理时, 页表并不能储存所有信息且使它们便于维护, 所以需要使用额外的数据结构.

这些数据结构包括但不限于: 空闲页链表, 页置换算法中的各种数据结构.

这些数据结构往往使用内核空间中的一段内存, 在一定情况下它们可能被置换到外存.

对数据结构的利用视情况不同, 可以在不同的地方调用. 例如在访存时需要的算法较快, 因为访存量非常大. 而缺页中断时的算法可略复杂一些.

扩展: 磁盘缓存. 使用内存模拟外存, 提高外存 IO 速度. 这与虚拟内存不矛盾. 都是为了提高硬件利用效率. LRU 算法在这里会被用到.

向勇的注：

  • 请有兴趣的同学尝试枚举ucore中与虚拟存储管理相关的主要数据结构，并说明它们会在什么时候被哪些代码所访问。
history.subject: [总结] 虚拟存储管理中的辅助数据结构
